paragraphs.text: This is a list of alleged sightings of unidentified flying objects or UFOs in Brazil.
Two men were found dead near Niter√≥i. Both were wearing lead masks. A UFO allegedly was seen flying near the point where both died.[12]
This was the first operation of the Brazilian Air Force conducted only to investigate UFO-related issues. This operation was started shortly after the Colares UFO flap.
A series of UFO sightings all over the states of Southeastern Brazil.[16]
